name: Ball Keeper
description:
Ball Keeper Tools

Engine: Godot

Art: Aseprite

Audio: Audacity

Music: Sonic Pi

Game

Welcome Ball Keeper!!

Your task is to escort this ball around the arena, safely...

Use our custom Blocks to help guide our little friend.

WASD to move

Follow the Ball unit around and make sure its safe.

You can do this by placing Block units down with LEFT CLICK.

You can only have 15 Block units active at one time, so place carefully.
